source: 一九九三年的那个冬天，对我来说最重要的事，是我爸爸回来了，就在我妈结婚前的那个星期。十二月的一个下午，他到学校来找我。我一路飞奔向大门口，隔着铁栏杆远远地看到他站在外面抽烟。身上穿着一件黑色长风衣，竖起的领子遮住了半张脸。不知道为什么，连他的样子也没有看清，就觉得他过得似乎很不好。我的心一酸，眼泪掉了出来。
translation: In 1993, the most important thing that happened to me was that my father returned home, just a week before my mother's wedding. On a winter afternoon in December, he came to find me at school. I ran towards the gate, and from afar, I saw him standing outside, smoking. He was wearing a black long-sleeved shirt, and his collar was raised, covering half of his face. I don't know why, but even his appearance seemed unfamiliar to me, and my heart ached. Tears streamed down my face.

source: 我没想过我妈妈会有再婚的念头。或许潜意识里，我觉得她应该因为我爸爸的离开而一直痛苦下去，就像我一样。况且，我觉得她缺少那种找到幸福的能力。事实也许的确如此，可是幸福有能力找到她。不是吗，作为一个美人，根本不必那么辛苦，她什么都不用做，只要站在原地就好了。
translation: "I never thought my mother would remarry. Perhaps subconsciously, I felt that she should be sad and hurt forever, just like me. Moreover, I felt that she lacked the ability to find happiness. But in reality, happiness can find her. After all, as a beautiful woman, she doesn't need to work hard. She can just stand in one place and everything will be fine."

source: 我还记得，那一年的冬天特别长，四月过了一半，迎春花还没有开。父母离婚的事，令你的情绪很消沉。我们好久都没有什么新游戏了，一到傍晚就百无脚赖地坐在死人塔的房顶上。院子里散落的那些身体部件中，又多了几只胳膊。我们用钩子把它们拨到一起，摆成了一个千手观音。
translation: "I still remember that winter, it was especially long. It was already halfway through April, but the spring flowers hadn't bloomed yet. The divorce between my parents made me feel very depressed. We hadn't had any new games for a long time, and every evening we would sit on the roof of the house in the courtyard, feeling listless. There were more and more spiders in the courtyard, and we used a stick to sweep them up and create a 'thousand-handed Guanyin'."

source: 我爸爸其实对做生意一窍不通，只是去投奔一个并不相熟的表哥。我奶奶有个妹妹，早年去了北京，后来在那里结婚生子。这个表哥是她家的长子，在整个家族里，一直作为一个异类存在。
translation: My father actually didn't have much of a connection to the business world, he just went to visit a distant relative. My mother had a younger sister who had moved to Beijing early on and got married there. This cousin was her family's eldest son and was considered an outcast within the entire family.

source: 刚才你说每个人都有一个起运的时间，人生好像忽然套上了缰绳。我的应该是在八岁。那年秋天，爸爸离开济南，一个人去了北京。从那以后，我就再也没有家了。
translation: "You just said that everyone has a time when their luck changes, and it seems like life has suddenly put on a pair of golden handcuffs. My time should have been when I was eight years old. That autumn, my father left Jinan and went to Beijing alone. From then on, I never had a home again."

source: 我并不打算赴约。不管是因为什么，我想我们都没有再见面的必要了。我坐在沙发上一支一支地抽烟，天色越来越暗，门突然笃笃地敲响了。送水的男孩扛着水桶站在门囗，说是给西郊的一户人家送水去了。他戴着一顶脏兮兮的灰色毛线帽子，神情恍惚。
translation: "I don't plan on going to the appointment. Regardless of the reason, I think it's unnecessary for us to meet again. I'm sitting on the sofa, taking puffs of smoke, and the sky is getting darker. Suddenly, there's a knock on the door. The water delivery boy is standing outside with a water tank, saying he's there to deliver water to a household in the west end. He's wearing a worn-out gray woolen hat, looking quite wretched."

source: 我们的谈话进行得很艰难。每次陷入沉默，我都觉得心脏受到压迫，只想快点结束这次见面。你似乎有所察觉，但还在努力寻找话题。茶冷下去，屋子里的白雾已经散尽，你终于起身告辞。我刚关上门，感觉松了一囗气，门铃又响了。你站在门囗，请我晚些到小白楼来。我还没有来得及推辞，你已经走出了楼洞。
translation: Our conversation was going on with great difficulty. Every time we fell into silence, I felt my heart being pressed, and I just wanted to quickly end this meeting. You seemed to have noticed, but you were still trying to find topics to talk about. The tea had gone cold, and the white mist in the house had already dissipated. You finally got up to leave, and I had just closed the door when I heard the doorbell ring again. You were standing at the door, asking me to come to the small white building in the evening. I hadn't even had time to decline when you had already left the building.

source: 我走到厨房关掉炉子。水已经蒸发了半壶，整个房间弥漫在白雾里。你局促地坐下来，看着我倒茶。 "你还跟奶奶和姑姑一起住吗？"你问。 我告诉你，奶奶已经去世了，现在我和姑姑一起生活。 "她一直没成家"　你问。 "嗯。"
translation: "I'm going to the kitchen to turn off the stove. The water has already boiled half a pot, and the whole room is filled with white mist. You sit down and watch me pour tea. 'Do you still live with your grandmother and aunt?' you ask. I tell you that my grandmother has passed away, and now I live with my aunt. 'She never got married' you ask. 'Yes.'")

source: 你嘴巴里呼出的白色哈气，被风撩起的卷曲头发，大衣下摆底下微微颤动的膝盖，这些让我相信眼前的你是真实的存在，并非是先前那个梦的延续。十八年没见了，认不出来也不奇怪。你没有化妆，苍白的脸有一点浮肿，不过总算没有辜负大家的期望，长成了一个美人。只是那张桃心小脸乌戚戚的，一副在大都市待久了的神情。你问我，你的样子是不是和我想象的不一样。我不置可否地笑了笑。坦白说，我从未想象过你长大之后的样子。对我而言，和你有关的一切都已经装进档案袋，封上了火漆。说出来或许会有些伤人吧，不过，我真的没有期待与你再见面。
translation: "You're not wearing any makeup, and your pale face has a hint of puffiness. But overall, you've grown into a beautiful woman, and you haven't disappointed our family's expectations. Your small, delicate face is still as charming as ever, but there's a sense of maturity in your eyes that comes from living in the city for a long time. You ask me if your appearance has changed from how I imagined it. I can't help but smile. To be honest, I've never thought about what you'd look like after you grew up. For me, everything related to you has already been packed away in a file and sealed with wax. Perhaps saying this might hurt you a little, but I really haven't been expecting to see you again."

source: 我睁开眼睛。你站在门囗。我不知道你已经站了多久，没准连我在梦里大笑都看到了。还有醒来的悲伤，最虚弱时刻的样子。程恭，你低声喊出我的名字，声音非常沙哑，似乎已经很久没有开囗讲过话。快要下雪了，天阴得厉害，屋子里黑漆漆的。炉子上的水沸了，咕嚕噜地翻滚着。我仔细地看了你一会儿，确信自己并不认识你。可是在昏暗的光线里，我忽然觉得这个站在对面的陌生人，似乎与我的生命有很深的联结。那种感觉让人背后一阵发凉。我努力回想着，记忆的卡片在头脑中晔啦晔啦地翻动。然后你说，你是李佳栖。
translation: "I open my eyes and see you standing at the door. I don't know how long you've been standing there, and I didn't even notice you in my dreams. There's also a deep sadness and a fragile appearance, like a ghost. Zhang Gui, you call out my name in a low voice, and your voice sounds like it hasn't been used for a long time. It's about to snow, and the sky is dark and gloomy. The room is pitch black, and the water on the stove is boiling. I carefully observe you for a while, and I'm sure I don't recognize you. But in the dim light, I suddenly feel a deep connection between this stranger standing opposite me and my own life. That feeling makes my back feel cold. I try to recall, and the memories in my mind start to flip through like a card game. Then you say, 'I am Li Jiaju.'"
